headline: L3Harris Technologies (LHX) and Shield AI Partner to Advance AI-Powered Electronic Warfare
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 18 AI News and Ratings Making Waves on Wall Street. In this article, we are going to take a look at where L3Harris Technologies, Inc. (NYSE:LHX) stands against the other AI stocks. In a recent discussion at CNBC’s ‘Squawk on the Street’, NYU professor and AI expert, Gary Marcus […]

headline: L3Harris Announces Quarterly Dividend Increase
summary: MELBOURNE, Fla., February 28, 2025--The Board of Directors of L3Harris Technologies (NYSE: LHX) has approved an increase in the company’s per share quarterly cash dividend rate from $1.16 to $1.20.

headline: L3Harris Supports Innovative Technology at Florida Semiconductor Summit
summary: L3Harris hosted representatives of industry, academia and government at the Florida Semiconductor Summit this week as they worked toward the goal of ensuring the United States remains at the forefront...
